content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i were sitting on my back deck looking at the stars and she said, "what is that a bird?"  i had seen something moving in the sky but did not pay attention until she mentioned it.  immediately we could tell it was not a bird.  the sky was clear but this thing seemed fuzzy or hazy, maybe see through.  it moved liked it was gliding or being "pulled" along, not being propelled or pushed through the air.  it seemed to be floating and moved some side to side as it kept moving along.  it flew across the sky and then over the house where we could no longer see it.  we both knew that it was a ufo.  it was like nothing we had ever seen, even very hard to discribe.  no way a camera would have captured, it was difficult to acquire by the naked eye. there were seven cirles or spheres in the formation of two sides of a triangle. one at the point and three on each side. you could see them but they didn't seem to be lit, more like dimly glowing or just reflecting light from the city. it looked like there was a shadow filling in the rest of the triangle. is a good word for it "cloaked"?
it was eerily quiet.  it seemed that it was more quiet when it went by.
looking back the experience was surreal, it was nothing like we had ever seen, we are still trying to process it.  would love to get another look some time.
content.summary: 7 circle shapes in the pattern of two sides of a triangle. moving in the direction following the point. looked fuzzy or see thruugh. no sound. maybe just reflected light from it.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 12:45 am, i saw a a large fiery green ball streak across the sky in my backyard. it appeared to have crash landed about a mile east of my home. within 2 minutes, a helicopter with blinking red lights and one solid blue light appeared and began circling an area of about one square mile east of my home and continued to hold this pattern for at least 30 minutes. i drove my car toward the area where the crash could have occurred, all the while watching the helicopter continue on it's path, but there were no signs of a crash, fire, or emergency services response. as i write this, it is 1:30 am and the helicopter is still circling in the same pattern, without a searchlight on i might add.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Circle,  Fireball,  Sphere,  Star-like
content.summary: Fiery green ball.

content.detailedDescription:
I went with a friend to sedona, arizona for three days. that night she told me to go some places to take pictures and we went to a place called more or less, takepalake. there are stores and restaurants, but at that time every thing was closed. she told me to sit at the border of a water fountain and i did and she took a picture, she took a few more picture and next day we went back to vegas.
when we returned to las vegas she sent me the picture to my computer and i found out that up in the sky behind me was something. my son zoomed the picture and we saw that it was a hexagon. he separated the hexagon from me to zoom it and we saw figures inside it.
i will never know what it is, but it is not easy to see shapes like this in the sky, some people think it could be a hologram sent by an space ship, but as i said, i don't know what it is.
for a few days i had the strange feeling that this was some kind of sign and then i dismissed it and tried to forget it.
thank you for reading.

{pid}
content.summary: It was a hexagon.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine and i where sitting out by here house stargazing on a hillside by here town home complex in burnsville mn. the clouds where starting to move in, so i was not hoping to see many constellations. as we sat talking i began to notice six dim lights in the sky in the shape of a hallow. it was very clear that they made up some sort of a disc hovering in the air. at first i thought that maybe they where just stars peaking through the clouds, but as the clouds kept moving in i noticed that the lights did not leave. though they where slightly dimmer. they seemed to be within the clouds. for a moment i figured that they could be spotlights. however there where no beams of light shining up into the sky. at this point i asked my friend if she saw that halo too. she in fact did. we watched it for almost half an hour until it finally started to dim. eventually i could no longer see the lights and lost track of the object. not once did the object move. though i do believe that at some points it could have. however my eyes are not so great and i have issues with lights. neither of us wanted to leave the hillside and miss the event and neither of us had any recording device available, so we where unable to record it. 

the entire time i had no idea what to think. i am still slightly frightened and even embarrassed(surprisingly) that it happened. i do not want people thinking that i am crazy and if their are any other explanations i would be happy to hear them.
content.summary: There where six bright lights in a circle perfectly aligned hovering and able to be seen through the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Outside talking on the cell phone.I seen the neighbors house light up bright with a stobe type light.I figured it was an ambulance or firetruck coming down the street.I kept talking on the phone.The light got brighter,flew over the top of my house and lit everything up like daylight,but with a very white light.I kept talking on the phone then i realized this object was not making any noise at all.It was also moving very slowly.I held the phone up so the person i was talking to might hear something,he said he did not hear anything.I watched as it went over my neighbors house going east.It appeared to go on down the street and turn to the south towards the i-10 freeway.On the southside of the freeway is buckeye airport.I watched it until i could not see it anymore.One strange thing i thougt of as it flew and turned it stayed flat in the turn,it did not bank over as an airplane would.I could not make the shape out good.The lights were bright.As it headed away from me it seemed very dark the shape and possibly a tall center section,such as a tail.The lights stayed on all the way as it flew.I also noted the phone did not loose reception or have stactic.I finally hung up on the guy.I seen the ufo hot spots article on the net on msn so i thought i would write.After the sighting i came into my house told my wife,step son and his wife.They all laughed of course.This event did not scare me or give me the creeps in anyway.I figured i would eventally run into somebody else in my area who seen it,no luck so far.This has bugged me since i seen it.Did anybody else report a sighting that night in my area? i am curious and would like to know.I told people at work and other family members.Please let me know if it was reported by anybody else.Thanks. {pid}
content.summary: In my yard flew over my house. no sound, two bright white lights shined down on me. flew over neighbors house on down the street.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying on the grass looking at the stars when movement grabbed my attention. it was difficult to process what exactly i was seeing at first but then i got a focus on it. the object was and inverted v with the point traveling forward. the object was difficult to focus on because it was made up of five (5) individual lights on each side, they appeared as though they were stars that would be visible with the naked eye. it moved as a whole object at a very odd speed, it appeared to slide across the sky with no resistance whatsoever, it was unlike anything i have ever seen as far as objects in flight. it also appeared to be transparent because i couldn't distinguish between the night sky and the object other then the lights moving in the inverted v pattern. from my perspective the object had to have been relatively low in the sky based off of its size (spacing between the lights as the basis of the objects size)yet there was no audible noise to be heard. it moved in the northwest direction and disappeared out of sight, almost as if it were two dimensional. seeing this shook me up a little bit because nothing about it seemed normal, it was very difficult to believe my eyes and i doubt i would have if someone else hadn't seen it as well and been equally shaken by what was seen. this was my first time seeing anything like this and i was never a believer or a skeptic prior to this, i think that's why the event bothered me so much.
content.summary: Inverted v, five lights on each side similar to visible stars, moving as one object.

content.detailedDescription: On april 16, 2009 i was outside my house with my wife feeding my dog. i was looking up at the sky to see if the moon was out and i saw a huge triangle shaped object with dim (foggy) lights along the edges passing overhead. i told my wife to look, and she asked me what it was. i told her i had no idea, but that it was huge. living in los angeles i see passenger airliners overhead all the time, so i have a pretty good idea of perspective on their size. this object was flying at a higher altitude than they do, and it was 5 to 6 times their size! it was traveling west slowly, and we could not hear any noise coming from it. i have seen many things in my life, and i am not an alarmist or a "wishful thinker". i know that what we saw was real, and not something i have ever seen before. we went inside after it passed by and checked the local news. nothing. i then went online, and again, nothing. i would very much like to know if anyone else saw this object.
content.summary: Huge triangle passing silently over east los angeles.

content.detailedDescription: I was dead asleep @ 3am ish on april 16th 2009 my finacee woke me up to hear what i thought at first was a street sweeper. i told her to go back to bed but she insisted i get up and look out side. i admit at first i was sure it was a street sweeper a couple streets over it was a very dull humming like a electrical transformer. i looked out the window on my side of the bed...Nothing i walked to the front room facing our street nothing. the sound kept a stationary volume. i told her it had to be a street sweeper. so i walked over to her side of the bed and looked out the window for sure i would see some sort of sweeper or utility truck a street or two over between the houses..Nothing and the sound yet stayed staionary at what seemed to be just over our house to the wood line.That area of the sky is pretty dark but kinda against the sky which was slightly cloudy i could make out this very seemingly large shadow or just black diamond boomarang shape looking thing drifting over the tree line and the humming..I can't get over the humming..No visiable lights nothing just blackness and a ever constant humming i didn't want to alarm my fiancee so i told her nothing was there it must have been a sweeper a couple of streets over. i dont know how to take this. we live around a lot of military type bases in maryland so that was my first though but i never have seen or in-countered a sound like that.I don't know...Im puzzled im not sure if this has anything to do with this but i felt a little wierd after that and seen my dr. the next day with pains in my back and chest. i wasn't feeling the best before but the next day i felt very strange never the less maybe it's nothing.
content.summary: Finacee woke me up @ 3am to hear a strange noise from sky.

content.detailedDescription: At 1907hrs on 16 april 2009, i was in my house watching tv, when something caught my eye as it passed by our skylight.  i repositioned myself and noticed it was unlike any aircraft i had seen, in person, before.  it was a large aircraft, though size cannot be determined since it was dark and i live in maine, therefore there is no frame of reference as to size, speed, or altitude.  i can say for sure that the aircraft did emit a sound very similar to that of a jet engine, yet muffled.  the craft was triangular in shape, with three (3) white lights, one at each point of the triangle, and one (1) or two (2) red lights dead-center.  the craft was in my field of view for approximately 10-15 seconds.  the two things that struck me as most odd were that none of the lights were blinking and there was no apparent attempt to evade public view.
content.summary: Fly-by of triangle-shaped aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house doing dishes on january 26th around 8 p.M. est. my boyfriend went outside on my porch to have a cigarette, as he always does.  it was a starry night and he began looking at this (so called) star (disk like shape) that started spinning and turning weird colors.  he ran in the house and got his digital camera.  took a video of this surprisingly star that was very entertaining.  spinning up and down and side to side and turning colors.  then it disappeared. just dropped out of the sky.  anyone know what this is???
content.summary: Looked like a star and then it started turning colors and spinning around.

content.detailedDescription: I saw the objects after reviewing the video. at 44 seconds 4-5 objects seem to bounce through the path of the airplane. they change positions at least 4 times. i don't know if there is a normal explanation for this but it seemed weird to me.
content.summary: Grey/white objects move through picture.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside on patio grilling, observing unusually clear sky when noticed very shiny round object about the size of a quarter appear in the sky. it moved slightly up and diagonally. the entire time it did this is got smaller in the sky (same shiny reflective appearance) i went in the house to get binoculars to view object better. upon my returning to the patio object was no longer in view. occurred in under 3 minutes. i scanned for object with binoculars but saw nothing. as a side note, i did see several planes right before and after seeing object. the object dwarfed them in the sky.
content.summary: Quarter size object in sky, very reflective moved upward diagonally up and out of view.

content.detailedDescription: 1.I could'nt sleep so i started reading 2.I saw a big flash and then it turned into 3 lights 3.I had no idea what it was. 4.It would disapear if i moved my head then it started spinning.5. i was shaking and shivering like never before. 6.It spun and then boom gone just like that!
content.summary: Circular with 3 lights on the front

content.detailedDescription: My teenager (13) had opened the front door for us to receive fresh air!  they were on their way to bed, for school the next day.  we were looking out at the water tower on the hospital grounds. she suddenly yelled, "moma, what is that?  what is that?"  i asked her where, because my eyes were focused on the water tower and wal-mart (approx. 100 ft.)  she said, "it looks like smoke!  coming towards us!"  at that very moment, my eyes picked up on the thing she referred to.  nothing in my database could explain what this was.  even though it's dark, we live in a well-lit area.  the first thing i thought was birds, flying in formation!  until i grabbed my binoculars and had a closer look.  each item i thought was a bird, was oval shapped.  almost like an egg!  by this time i paniced.  i grapped her inside by the shirt, and locked the screen.  these things slowed down and changed into several shapes.  one modeling a mosquito.  the others i couldn't quite identify because i was in awe.  at first, they were in v formation; as if they were birds flying like i said earlier.  there were no sound at all.  and they floated from east to west real slow-like to allow us to view the many shapes they were making.  they were see-through as they floated in our face (20 ft approx.) and through these things, the sky was visible.  as soon as it floated to the end of my house where the steps were, they disappeared.  we all ran outside, afterwards of course, to see where they had gone.  i wanted to get a picture with my camera.  it was me(35), daughter (13), son (11), and son (4).  it took me almost half an hour to calm down my four year old. this happened in a spann of six min.  for all of us to see.  it wanted to be seen, well they, wanted to put on a show, and they did.  if they were birds, as they passed the trees, they would be visible to us for a few more hundred feet.  but, to just disapper in the blink of an eye, after a photo-show, was extraordinary.  these were not birds i admit.  i am a teacher with a high iq, and have no reason to lie about anything.  as a matter of fact, i did not believe in anomalies, but now i want to know what the world did i see? i am a believer in the unknown now.
content.summary: 20 to 30 ovals flying in bird formation; as it approached the children and i, it changed numerous shapes!

content.detailedDescription: Have already reported this event to the colorado network in 2000
content.summary: Several triangles fllying in formation doing amazing aerial moves and then disappearing straight up at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: I was a child about age 9 living in las vegas, nevada at the time. it was an overcast day in the early to mid afternoon and i was looking out of a north facing window which was on a second floor level of an apartment building. i forget why i was looking out the window but this sighting is all i remember of that day. i was in my sisters' room at the university park apartments a block away from unlv. i had to stand atop a bed in order to look out the window due to the window's basement-like, high, horizontal orientation. from the west heading to the east i saw a large, low-flying ship just below the clouds. the appearance of which looked bronze-colored with a sort of faceted surface (somewhat similar to that of the the angular shapes of the f-117 stealth). the shape is unlike anything i have seen before and would not fall under a normal "ufo" description as it was not at all like a disc. the shape was more like a manta-ray with a long nose. something similar would be a star trek like ship. at the "nose" of the craft were what appeared to be windows of a cockpit, they were basically pitch black rectangles at the front of the "nose". the craft flew very slowly towards the east and after about 10 seconds or so it slowly began turning slightly north, again very slowly. as the craft turned north, i could see the backside, which appeared to have a type of wing that came down from the craft at an angle towards the ground. my line of sight was then blocked by some trees. heading into my mothers room which was the next room to the left, i was unable to see the craft again.
content.features: Window(s),  Patterned Surface,  Appendage(s),  Louvres,  Wings,  Other
content.summary: Wierd shaped craft flying slowly over las vegas, nevada in early 90's.

content.detailedDescription:
I took these photos out my side window while i was driving. ( time 4:40 pm) i was watching the road. i took random shots for photo reference for paintings . there were no clouds in the sky. clear blue sky day.
i discovered these images after downloading them on to my computer the next day.
the smaller one is the first photo. the larger one is the second photo. these appear to be the same object, moving from southeast to northwest. the mountains run north to south. i was facing south on hwy 89 about 5 miles south of livingston.
the trees on the mountain are about 80 feet tall so this thing must have been pretty big and moving fast. 
i didn't hear any noise.
content.summary: Photos taken out my car window while driving.

content.detailedDescription:
This morning i was on my way to work while riding on the midway orange line train, i happen to be looking out the window over at the 35th and archer stop, i saw this glowing disk shape object when loking towards the south east. it just stud therte for about 35 sec. and the it flew away.

i really don't know that this is, but perhaps maybe you all can figure this out and tell me what this is?
content.summary: Ufo spotted on chicago's midway orange line.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just got out of my car at the petrol station in my local town (port talbot) when i noticed an orange light in the sky. at first i thought it was a helicopter (we get quite a few over the town with strong spotlights looking for who knows what) as it was moving slowly and that maybe the orange light was blocking my view of the helicopter. i had to fill up the car with petrol which i remember being annoyed at as i really wanted to see what this light was.

after filling up with petrol i tried to make visual contact again whilst driving (not recommended). i was getting occasional views of the light but i couldn't stop as i was on a busy road with nowhere to pull over.

as i was making my way to another garage to inflate my tyres the light was above and in front of me. i was still driving and trying to keep eye contact with the light. it went directly overhead and i managed to slow down and get a better view. the light was almost the same intensity and colour of a street light but just above the orange light i could make out a strange dark disk shape that i can only describe as appearing to vibrate. it was blurred like an out of focus object. it was this that really made me realise this object was unusual. there was no sound and i would say it was no more than 150 to 200 ft above me.

i lost sight as it went overhead and i remember cursing that i couldn't pull over to get a better view, i was also only a few minutes from home (with a camcorder waiting to be utilised) but by the time i got home i couldn't see the light at all. 

i should add that our local paper had a small write up on the incident confirming my sighting as being unusual and independently witnessed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange light with strange blurred disk above it moving over town at low altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a cigarette as i had also just let my cat out who was acting up (this is very strange for her to do that as she is a very mellow animal). i happened to notice what i took to be a very bright star at around 45 degrees to the western horizon. i did not think much of this at first until it moved, the light was displaying a flickering pattern with the naked eye that seemed to be greenish red. now for one stars don���t move and yes they do flicker but not to this degree. i went inside and got my high power binoculars and tripod stand. through these i was able to see what i first thought to be a star was in fact a flat cigar shaped object, flashing blue, green, white, and red in that order. 
the object remained fixed in this position for 5 mins during which time i called my flat mate to see what she thought of the object through the binoculars. i then observed the object move off to the northwest gaining height it is at this point it just simply vanished. the whole observation time was exactly 15 mins.
i know this is not a spectacular report but interesting none the less.
i have ruled out what normal things it could be
1. star: stars do not move and do not display this light pattern or look cigar shaped.
2. fixed wing aircraft: fixed wing aircraft do not hover and do not display this light pattern.
3. helicopter: these do not hover in one spot for 15 mins also the light pattern is wrong. on top of this it was a still clear night and no wind with an air temp of 8 degrees. (christchurch is a very small city and at 12pm on a monday night it becomes very still). there are also very few helicopters that operate out of the christchurch airport and they have a very distinct sound that can you can hear for miles (the airport is less than 5 kilometres from where i live and to the north of the object.
4. balloons/blimps: there are no blimps here in new zealand and hot air balloons are not allowed to fly at night over the city.
above all normal aircraft do not just simply vanish as this craft did. other strange effects to add to this are some odd electrical effects shortly before i went out for a cigarette. the lights in the house flicked twice as well as the radio producing static. the power here can get a little odd at times due to all the substations in and around the city sending power to the north island and we get power spikes on and off so i put it down to that at first but now i am not so sure.

sorry i do not have a photo of the object as i did not have my cam at home as it was at work.
content.summary: Flat cigar shape very clear through high power binoculars.

content.detailedDescription: On thursday evening, april 9, 2009, at exactly 10:10 pm, my wife and i both witnessed an unlit helicopter followed immediately by another helicopter that had red lights on it. we were driving south on e-470 at the east edge of the metropolitan denver area, very near southlands mall at smoky hill road. i first noticed two red lights on a low-flying aircraft that appeared to be ready to cross over e-470 just in front of us, from right to left (west to east) and looked up with curiosity as i started to hear the rather loud rumble of a low flying helicopter.  the moon was full (full at 8:56 pm that night to be exact), and it brightly lit up the southeast part of the sky above us through some broken and hazy clouds. against the bright moonlit part of the sky i saw the black silhouette of a completely unlit helicopter leading the red lights by perhaps 100 feet, very roughly. immediately, a second helicopter followed on its tail across the moonlit part of the sky, and i could see its silhouette too. it was lit with the red lights. for a few seconds i could see both helicopters at the same time, one following directly behind the other in single-file order. i sensed the two helicopters were of the same make, but my wife thought perhaps they were slightly different models.  looking at pictures on the internet we both agree they were a close match to uh-60 black hawk military helicopters, again as a rough guess. as the two helicopters passed overhead going east, i continued to watch them out my driver's side window. they quickly disappeared into the darker part of the sky, but i did noticed a very small and very dim, steady yellow light on the unlit helicopter that was in the lead, probably in the tail rotor area. i had the impression the only purpose of this tiny light was as a visible safety indicator for the sake of the pilot of the helicopter following very closely on its tail. that light was so very dim that within seconds it faded from my view and only the red lights of the second helicopter were then visible as they proceeded at a steady clip off to the east. without the moon in the background, i'm sure we would not have noticed the leading helicopter at all. perhaps these two helicopters were from buckley afb out on a training mission of some sort, but it struck me very odd that one of them would be flying dark over the community at such low altitude. tonight i heard a rumor someone else reported something similar on the same night, so combining the data from both reports might help figure out if this was an explainable military training event, or if something odd was going on.
content.summary: Two helicopters together, one lit with red rights, the other no lights.

content.detailedDescription: We were returning from a shopping trip  to foz de igau���u. we went to see the famous falls and shop on the paraguay side of the border at that time there were always many brasilians shopping there because we couldn't import things at that political time. we got the last seats of the bus that was full and there were many busses leaving at almost the same time since it was near christmas and you had a limit of $150.00 for each person per trip. i had a cold and my boyfriend  gave me an asprin and we sat on the last seats. every one onboard closed the curtains of their windows as did my boyfriend. but after an hour and a half i opened the curtain since i love the night sky. we had already been stopped by the federal police to search for contraband and had passed through cascavel a small town. now we were on the main highway br 101 which is a two lane road one coming and the other going. some trucks and buses.The south of brasil is an agricultural area so i saw the feilds and ocaisionaly a cluster of trees, in one of those cluster which were far apart from each other i  saw a small orange light, so i thought it must be the farm house, ok. but as wecame closer the light and cluster got bigger, ok so we were getting closer to the house but then the light got very bigger and as we turned down the highway away from the cluster of trees the lght kept by our side. then i excitedly called my boyfriend as he woked up he closed the curtain saying i was delirious from my cold and i kept telling him but he dosen't believe in strange things and wouldn't listen. then i opened the curtain again and sad to see that the light was gone ,so i thought! all of a sudden i looked to the road down beside the bus and i saw the shadow of the bus on the asfalt. my first thought was street lights since brasil had begun to use these horrible orange street lights. then i realized that we were on the highway far from towns and cities and as i saw the light i felt the buss start to increase speed , i called my boyfriend he called me a nut and that i should let the passengers sleep. i looked out again and light was gone. at about 2 am the bus stops to change drivers and for a rest stop. i was dieing to ask the driver what he but my boyfriend kept ridiculizing me so i lost my nerve. i've never regreted something as much as not asking the driver what he saw. we reached rio the next day with no other incidents. but i will never forget
content.summary: Orange colored light that grew in size.

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday april the fifteenth i went out the front door of my apartment so my dog could relieve himself.  while waiting for the dog to do his thing i looked to the east over the neighboring apartment block and noticed six dots of light.  the points of light were easy to see because i live in the city and the stars are not visible.  the six points of light were arranged in a long pattern.  the lights were white in color.  a single point of light out front, two lights side by side fallowing that one and three side by side fallowing those.





                      *                  *


                                         * 
       *                                


                      *                  *  

this formation was moving at a swift pace in a north westerly direction.  the first light moved in a straight steady manner.  the second set of lights seemed to flutter or vibrate.  the third set of lights moved back and forth rapidly along the path of travel.  none of the lights changed there their position in the formation only moving within their respective positions.  i watched the formation move off to the northwest for around one to two minutes.  at this point i lost sight of the lights as they passed behind my apartment.  at first i thought they might be jets from barksdale air force base witch is to the east of me.  however the way the last row of lights were oscillating so rapidly they could not have been aircraft navigation lights.
content.summary: Lights flying in formation.

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting is from my then 13 year old son. he has been very reluctant to discuss what he saw, but his behavior since what he observed was what made me start asking some questions. his reluctance to talk about what he saw is part of why this report is delayed.
in background, i have earned three college degrees. both of my children are intelligent,well schooled, and not given to making things up. we live in an area where aircraft traffic is common, both of a high altitude (from o'hare) and lower level nature from the local airport. my son, in particular, shares my interest in aircraft and weapons. in short, if they see something in the sky, they have never had a problem identifying it.
on a drive from dekalb to elgin in january of 2009, around 6:45 pm, my son observed and object that crossed over the van he was riding in and then stopped shortly afterwards.My wife and son had just crossed illinois 47, heading west on plank road, when he noticed an object that was approaching their van from the north.The area in this part of the road is mainly farmfields, with clumps of both houses and trees scattered around. the weather was cold and clear; my son had spent time on the drive earlier looking at the stars and higher aircraft heading into o'hare.He was surprised, however, by what appeared to his left (north) in the front windsheild. it was up at 60 degrees or more and would eventually pass almost directly overhead.He describes it as the following:

a very large cube, around the size of a 2 story house. his outstretched open hand covered about 2/3 of the object. the object had a white light about as bright as an outdoor light or headlight seen at a distance located at each of the bottom 4 corners. these lights seem to vary in intensity a bit, growing brighter and dimmer, but only slightly.When he leaned forward as the object passed overhead and observed through the tinted part of the windsheild, he said the light was still the same intense white. the corner lights lit up part of the object which he desribed as grey,textured metallic looking material. the south facing facet had a white light that was more focused and directed at an angle toward the ground, but he couldn't see where it was pointing at exactly. as the object passed almost directly overhead, he had a good look directly at the bottom facing side and noticed a circular opening in the middle of the side that was straight down and not scooped like a crater. radiating outward in four directions, were wide troughs or valleys that went completely to the edge of the facet and could be seen travelling around to the adjacent side. these valleys crossed the facet's side between two of each corner light. he said it kind of looked like a sci-fi borg cube, but it was plain and had no features except what was noted above.

after the object passed overhead, it travelled a short distance and appeared to stop. by this time, he was now looking out the right side passenger window. the formerly south side facing "headlight" then began to slowly turn westward and eventually toward the north (and the van). he could not tell if the object itself turned or the light moved across the two facings. at this moment, he became frightened. however, the van had reached illinois route 20 and continued to head north, blocking the object with the car's roof. two miles later, the van turned east and the object was no longer visable. the object was never seen again. 
my wife remembers my son exclaiming "what is that?" several times, but she was focused on driving the van on an icy country road and she would have been required to lean forward and look up as it passed overhead. she refused to stop the car and she doesn't want to discuss what happened. my son is convinced on what he saw and he has convinced me,too.
content.summary: Square metallic object with lights flew over car and then stopped.

content.detailedDescription:
March 8th 2009, here in covington ga , me my brother and his wife experienced a ufo siting. . 

on this date, around 7:00-7:30 pm , i got a call from my brother,(curtis) very excited/worried , telling me to hurry and come over. after i arrived, he didn't put any label on what it was, he just simply asked me "what is that up there". . at first glance, i replied "looks like a bright white light". . . after this being said, he replied, "yeah, but there's no stars out right now" . .(it hadn't gotten dark yet)
while still observing the bright white light, something happened to convince me that it wasn't just a lone star. i began to see white lines projected in different angles. . and then pulled back in. . (i then closed my eyes and rubbed them with my knuckle to make sure that it wasn't possibly a glare from the light being so bright). . it was no glare. . the projecting lines, or what we called them at the time "wings" came out and were pulled back in for around 15-20 minutes, sometimes projecting out longer in length than others. . it was aparent that we were seeing the same thing and it was no glare, because when they were at a longer length, we both reacted at the same time explaining exactly what we were seeing. . . 

after watching this for around 30 mintues or so, we then saw another light going in the direction of the object we had been observing. this i easily identified as an airplane, (due to the flashing red lights) however, when the plane got somewhat close in the direction of the object, we then saw the object take off at a rediculous speed and a weird angle almost arching upward towards the sky. .We watched as the object got smaller and smaller until we could no longer see it. after the plane passes , we're still looking at the same point in the sky that the object was . . and out of nowhere, we saw the object fly back, at the exact same position and point in the sky as it was previous. . this was amazing. . 

after calming down, from what we saw, we continued to observe the object as it continued to project the wings, then pull them back in. afterwatching for another 15 minutes or so, we grew tired, and went in the house. later,a bit after 9:00 pm the object was nowhere to be seen. . 

my brother is a very straight laced,mature adult (39 years old) and a police officer. . . for me to witness this with someone that i look up to, someone that i believe (if i had mentioned or told him a story like this,that he hadn't witnessed with his own eyes, he would never believe me) 

i've always been a believer of extraterrestrial , ufo findings etc. . but always had that bit of doubt in the back of my mind. . after seeing this with my own eyes. . and with my brother being there seeing the same thing, backing me up. . . there is no doubt in my mind that aliens,ufo's,and life on other planets do exist. . . 

i have 5 , 30 second video clips, plus a picture taken with his nextel i880 video phone as proof. . not the best quailty, but i'm glad we had something to capture some type of evidence that we saw something out of the ordinary. . . 

i will be recording a video explaining exactly what i saw, this week, followed by all 5 video clips and picture summing up what we saw march 8th 2009

any information of groups or organizations in the metro atlanta georgia area that shed light, investigates, or just has other witnesses of ufo's and extraterrestrial life would be appreciated.  is there a mufon ga?

aaron gordon
content.summary: Bright flickering white light.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv,my mother asked my older sister to call another sister at her friend's house, home for dinner.A few min.Later the door opened, i turned to look at my sister and saw that she was white as a ghost, an trying to say something.All she could do was point out the door.I went first, then my sisers an mom.It was dark out.Standing on the walkway ,and looking to the ne.Over, but beyond  my school and the surrounding area called govmt.Property, we could not help but see a elongated bright white light. it was about a mile away,an about 2-3000 ft.High,an apprx. 1-2000ft.In length (possibly more).It was totaly quiet outside(so were we).I remember thinking it might be a searchlight from nas. whidbey isl.,but it was much brighter, no shaft of light was comeing from the ground, and it was perfectly still in the dark (i do'nt remember seeing any star's) sky.Within second's of going out(it seemed) and seeing this,something told me to turn around,i saw some,if not all our neighbor's, standing in front of there house's looking up in silence.(i still have that particular memory ,and the feeling of how strange this all was, an how still and quiet everyone was.)i turned back an watched the light (still in the same place)for another minute or so, and wondering what it could be,and why i did'nt hear any plane's from the base (3 miles away)to check it out.All of a sudden in a slight arc toward's the east(almost straight) up it shot, shrinking out of site in maybe just more than a second.--- post note;all of these memories only became aware to me 7 yr's later,when a slightly different incident happend,wittnessed by my girlfriend and some other's,over kaneohe marine air base in apprx. june 1976.Since then i have asked my mother,who is now deceased,and my sister's about that night,and if they remembered it.My mother's eye's got so wide an full of tear's (an fright!!)that she truly started babbelling an would not talk to me for a day an half,and refused to talk about it any more.As for my sister's,they said they did'nt remember anything like that, an looked at me as if i was loseing my mind. but after around a week or so, one of my sister's an i were together, and she admitted that she did remember and felt bad for not saying so.Shortly after that my other sister(after talking with the other one)said she did too.
content.summary: Over 1000 ft. length, apprx. 2-3000 ft. alt., apprx. 1mile from my house, over military housing and radar site.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the tv show house and an unusual bright light caught my eye i looked out the window and said no this can't be what i think it is but after continuing to watch my show the light did not go away so my camera was on the end table in the living room so finally i could not ignore the brightness and went out on the patio to look and i snapped a couple of photos and i began videoing the object however the screen on my patio prohibited any good video. i was using a kodak camera. this went on for about an hour and fifthteen minuets at which time it then started having red, yellow and green lights going round and round and then it became dimmer and just disappeared ( did not fly away ) just disappeared has never been there before this night and has not been back.
content.summary: Brightly lite disc shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: I attended my first ufo conference in santa clara ca on the weekend of sept 27/28 of 2008. during the lunch break which was sometime between noon and 1pm to the best of my recolection and i think it was on the second day. there were a group of participants eating lunch outside the hotel lobby at least10-15.I came outside and found others looking up and calmy observing 3 silvery whitish orbs fixed in a triangular formation verry high up and some where able to observe a fourth. this continued for at least half an hour. i returned inside for a bit and came back out and the phenonomon continued and then slowly faded out. this was my first observation of a ufo and felt they appeared for us to see knowing we were all outside at that time. my feelings were actually calm but surprised at the timing of this event. the strange thing was thatthe following day a small grain like moveable lump appeared in my right thumb just below the joint which i have yet to have x-rayed. there is no scar and produces a queasy  sensation when manipulated, more troubling than the siting.
content.summary: 3 orbs appeared at lunchtime during ufo conference

content.detailedDescription: I left home at about 430 and got onto 680 northbound. as i was approaching the exit for ygnacio valley road, a bright flash in the distance caught my eye, and when i looked up in the sky, i saw what i thought was a meteorite streaking across the sky. as i was watching it, i started to realize that it wasn't a meteorite because it was moving far too slow. the object appeared to be spherical and surrounded by a bright green light or fire, the kind of green on those glow sticks that you usually see around halloween. i watched the object for about 10 seconds, during which it streaked across the sky in a straight line at about the same speed as a small private plane. right before it disappeared, it stopped in place and just seemed to blink out of existence. i spent the rest of the day trying to find out if there were any reports of meteorites or plane crashes, but i couldn't find anything.
content.summary: Bright green flash and streak

content.detailedDescription: I arrived at home from running an errand at probably 9:19pm.  i walked in to my bedroom and heard a very loud couple of helicopters outside and ran to the spare room window to see what was making all the racket.  i witnessed a large helicopter and another aircraft i could not identify flying together due north and not very far away from my condo.  i watched for as long as i could see both aircraft and then went into my roon and saw my alarm clock displaying 9:22pm.  i called and woke up my neighbor and asked if she heard the helicopter and proceeded to explain what i saw.  she verified right away that she heard the helicopter and came over to look from my vantage point.  we decided to take a drive over by rocky mountain airport (formerly jeffco airport i think) up in interlocken to see if we could see if they had landed there.  we were unable to see anything of that nature at the airport and we went home.  immediately realize that my main concern is that the aircraft did not have any visible lights working and was flying after dark.  it was flying in formation at exactly the same speed with a very loud helicopter possibly a double bladed heli.  i clearly saw lights on the helicopter the entire time both aircraft were visible.  i was under the impression the helicopter was escorting the craft flying due north at a very low altitude above arvada, colorado between wadsworth blvd and sheridan on thursday april 09, 2009 after dark at 9:20pm.  i cannot estimate the altitude without advice from someone with better judgment.  i only have a reference point of the position of the two aircraft with respect to the rooftops looking east out my spare room window.  i feel that this is a military aircraft until i am advised differently.  i am under the impression that the lightning ii, nighthawk, spirit, and raptor are unable to maintain a perfect formation with the super slow speed of a large double bladed helicopter.  i witnessed a stealth fighter many years ago and it was a very high speed aircraft very unlike the slow traveling aircraft i witnessed.   the stealth i saw years ago was the loudest aircraft i have ever heard and had no audible resemblance to the craft i saw last thursday.  i only heard the helicopter and i heard two blades but was focused on the craft in front and never verified if the helicopter was double bladed.  again... no lights were visible on the craft the entire time i was able to view them and lights were clearly visible on the helicopter.  a rainbow effect can be visible as oil floats on water.  this same rainbow effect was visible once in the front of the craft and once in the rear of the craft at a perfect side view giving me the impression the aircraft had two windows at least.  the craft was hard to see due to the lack of lights and became increasingly difficult to see the further away it got from me.  both aircraft traveled at the same speed the entire time and were clearly flying together.  the aircraft and the helicopter were roughly the same size but clearly not the same shape at all.
content.summary: The craft was possibly black in color.  the base of the craft was flat and resembled an angled door stop pointy in the front and back as opposed to dome shaped.
